glsa.title: SQLite: Remote code execution
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in SQLite may allow for the remote execution of code.

background.p: SQLite is a C library that implements an SQL database engine.

description.p: An integer overflow was discovered in SQLiteâ€™s FTS3 extension.

impact.p: A remote attacker could, by executing arbitrary SQL statements against a vulnerable host, execute arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
